name: uvector2
description: Fast 3kb React alternative with the same ES6 API. Components & Virtual DOM.

scripts.build: npm-run-all --silent clean transpile strip optimize minify size
scripts.optimize: uglifyjs dist/uvector2.dev.js -c conditionals=false,sequences=false,loops=false,join_vars=false,collapse_vars=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty --mangle-props --mangle-regex="/^(_|normalizedNodeName|nextBase|prev[CPS]|_parentC)/" --name-cache config/properties.json -b width=120,quote_style=3 -o dist/uvector2.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/uvector2.dev.js.map --source-map dist/uvector2.js.map
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/uvector2.js -c collapse_vars,evaluate,screw_ie8,unsafe,loops=false,keep_fargs=false,pure_getters,unused,dead_code -m -o dist/uvector2.min.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/uvector2.js.map --source-map dist/uvector2.min.js.map
scripts.strip: jscodeshift --run-in-band -s -t config/codemod-strip-tdz.js dist/uvector2.dev.js && jscodeshift --run-in-band -s -t config/codemod-const.js dist/uvector2.dev.js
scripts.smart-release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Jaiden Mispy <jaiden@mispy.me>
